Exile (Punishment)
metadata.title: Réflexions sommaires pour le sieur abbé de Caveirac
metadata.creator: Duval,conseiller-rapporteur
Duval, conseiller-rapporteur
Ader, avocat
Cellot, Louis, fl. 1756-1788?, printer
metadata.publisher: [Paris] : De l'imprimerie de Louis Cellot, rue Dauphine
metadata.description: Signed: Monsieur Duval, conseiller-rapporteur. Me. Ader, avocat

Plea to allow Jean Novi de Caveirac to return to Paris to defend himself against accusations that he penned Appel a la raison, des ecrits et libelles publiés par la passion, contre les jesuites de France, for which Louis XV exiled him
metadata.notes: Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Text extends off of the edge of the page. Text may be lost in the binding. Permanent creases may obscure some text. Title page and cover are combined.
